name: CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty.pretopology_le
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝⁵ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} C
inst✝⁴ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasPullbacks C
P Q : CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty C
inst✝³ : P.IsMultiplicative
inst✝² : P.IsStableUnderBaseChange
inst✝¹ : Q.IsMultiplicative
inst✝ : Q.IsStableUnderBaseChange
hPQ : LE.le P Q
⊢ LE.le P.pretopology Q.pretopology
decl:
lemma pretopology_le (hPQ : P ≤ Q) : P.pretopology ≤ Q.pretopology :=
  fun _ _ hS _ f hf ↦ hPQ f (hS hf)

name: CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty.pretopology_inf
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝⁵ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} C
inst✝⁴ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasPullbacks C
P Q : CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty C
inst✝³ : P.IsMultiplicative
inst✝² : P.IsStableUnderBaseChange
inst✝¹ : Q.IsMultiplicative
inst✝ : Q.IsStableUnderBaseChange
⊢ Eq (Min.min P Q).pretopology (Min.min P.pretopology Q.pretopology)
decl:
variable (P Q) in
lemma pretopology_inf :
    (P ⊓ Q).pretopology = P.pretopology ⊓ Q.pretopology := by
  ext X S
  exact ⟨fun hS ↦ ⟨fun hf ↦ (hS hf).left, fun hf ↦ (hS hf).right⟩,
    fun h ↦ fun hf ↦ ⟨h.left hf, h.right hf⟩⟩
